grading_explanation.practical_foundation: 2.7/3 – 21 of 35 fields filled (60% completion). Higher completion indicates better self-awareness and thoroughness.
grading_explanation.technical_competency: 1.8/2 – Proficient in Python, machine learning, deep learning, and data analysis; has hands-on experience with Git, GitHub, Jupyter, Aden, agentic AIs, VS Code, Excel, but could benefit from expanding knowledge in emerging technologies.
grading_explanation.hands_on_experience: 2.5/3 – Has completed internship at COTHON Solutions where he worked on machine learning and deep learning algorithms; participated in various competitions like AI Genesis and INNOTHON 2025, winning first place; has relevant projects such as ConvAi, Project 11, and Face and QR attendance.
grading_explanation.growth_potential: 1.7/2 – Shows initiative in learning through workshops and certifications like GitHub Foundations, Data Literacy from Datacamp, Chad GPT (Intermediate), Google Data Analytics specialization; actively participates in university coding and AI clubs, hackathons, and social initiatives.

hiring_insights.strongest_assets: Relevant technical skills, demonstrated hands-on experience through internship and competitions, strong academic performance.
hiring_insights.development_areas: Expanding knowledge in emerging technologies, providing more details about project roles, achievements, and solutions implemented.
hiring_insights.industry_readiness: Has a solid foundation for industry readiness but could benefit from further development and practical application of skills.

grading_debug.notes: This candidate has a good foundation in practical skills and technical competency with relevant experience. However, more details about projects and achievements would strengthen the employability potential.
